arStrings.szText: "Can you tell me about this geode I found in Hawezar?"
I haven't seen one of these in a while... from what I have heard, these require a special acid flux applied to them, to allow clean extraction of the gems within.

I'm afraid that's all I know about it. You should seek out Mislan in Zarbinzet to acquire the flux. I am sure he wouldn't mind if you used his bench to apply it too, the process is quite safe and simple.
